      • reweightFeatures

        public double[] reweightFeatures(ImageContainer query,
                        java.util.List<ImageContainer> positives,
                        DescriptorType type)
        calculates the new weight matrix for a given set of positive examples
        Parameters:
        query - the query image
        positives - the results marked as positive examples
        type - the type of the descriptor which was used for the search
        Returns:
        the weight matrix

      • relevanceFeedbackIteration

        public java.util.List<ImageContainer> relevanceFeedbackIteration(Retriever retriever,
                                                        ImageContainer query,
                                                        DescriptorType type,
                                                        Metric metric,
                                                        java.util.List<ImageContainer> positives,
                                                        java.util.List<ImageContainer> negatives,
                                                        int resultAmount)
        Performs a relevance feedback iteration. Side effect: all the RF Methods add the positively and negatively marked images to the query Image object.
        Specified by:
        relevanceFeedbackIteration in interface RelevanceFeedback
        Parameters:
        retriever - the retriever which is used to search.
        query - the query image.
        type - the descriptortype which was used for the query.
        positives - the images marked as positive.
        negatives - the images marked as negative.
        resultAmount - the number of desired results.
        Returns:
        the results after considering the user feedback.
